byline.contributor: Kevin Allison is a columnist at Reuters Breakingviews. For more independent commentary and analysis, visit breakingviews.com.

lead_paragraph: Slumping oil prices have spurred questions about the deal, and Williams now says it expects to cut its dividend if the sale goes through.

headline.main: Cracks Appear in Merger of Williams and Energy Transfer Equity

snippet: Slumping oil prices have spurred questions about the deal, and Williams now says it expects to cut its dividend if the sale goes through.
